name: Mama Coin
description: MamaFi (MAMA Coin) is a decentralized social and meme-based cryptocurrency project built on the Ethereum blockchain. It aims to create a censorship-resistant platform that promotes freedom of expression through blockchain technology. The project combines social media functionality with decentralized infrastructure, allowing users to share information and communicate securely without central control. MamaFi integrates a verification system for journalists, activists, and public figures to ensure content authenticity while maintaining user privacy through blockchain encryption. The project’s branding is centered on parody and satire, using the slogan “Make America Memeable Again” as a cultural commentary on digital freedom.
